mdRecord.dcterms:title: DeForest, Henry P. to Henry Faulds; 01 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2DeForest, Henry P. to Henry Faulds regarding the photograph and signature that Faulds sent him, the fingerprinting of primates, and his own fingerprint library. Address "Hotel Somerset, 150 West 47th Street, New York City, 59 West 54th Street" at top. Enclosed: List of DeForest's accumulating library.; 2 pages; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
